lead_paragraph: LEVY--Dr. Paul. 1941 - 2016. Congregation Beth Elohim, expresses its profound sorrow at the passing of Dr. Paul Levy, mathematics professor. Paul was a longtime member and served as a valued trustee and distinguished President from 1999 - 2003. Paul is survived by his wife Susan, his son Marc and daughter-in-law Cathy, his grandchildren Talia and Madeleine, and his sister Celia. Funeral services will be held at CBE, 274 Garfield Place in Brooklyn on Thursday, March 31 at 11am. Jonathan Fried, President Rachel Timoner, Sr. Rabbi 1/3
